supportPage.title: Support Center
supportPage.subtitle: We are here to help you 24/7
supportPage.subject: Subject
supportPage.submitSuccess: Support request sent! We will respond within 24 hours.
supportPage.askAnything: Ask me anything about our services!
supportPage.faqSubtitle: Find quick answers to common questions
supportPage.cantFindAnswer: Can't find the answer you need?
supportPage.contactInfoSubtitle: Multiple ways to get in touch with us
supportPage.faqHowToFindAnswer: You can use the search bar on the homepage or search page to filter by area, price, size and desired amenities. The system will display rooms that match your criteria.
supportPage.faqContactOwnerAnswer: Yes, after viewing room details, you can click 'Contact Landlord' to send a message or call directly. Contact information will be displayed after you register an account.
supportPage.faqRegisterAnswer: Click the 'Sign Up' button in the top right corner, fill in your personal information and confirm your email. You can choose to register as a tenant or landlord.
supportPage.faqPostRoom: Can I post rooms for rent?
supportPage.faqPostRoomAnswer: Yes, after registering a landlord account and verifying your information, you can post rental listings with full images, descriptions and contact information.
supportPage.faqFeesAnswer: EZStay is free for room seekers. For landlords, we have flexible service packages with reasonable fees for posting and managing rental properties.
supportPage.faqReportAnswer: You can click the 'Report' button on the room detail page or contact us through the support form. We will review and handle it as soon as possible.
supportPage.findQuickAnswers: Find quick answers to common questions
supportPage.multipleWays: Multiple ways to get in touch with us
